message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a competitive price. I'm confident you'll find it worth your while.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a purchase price of $750000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid $750000 is still below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $850000. This is a fair compromise considering the value I've placed on the product.

I understand your position, Alice. While I would like to make a deal, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to offer $800000 for the product. This is the maximum I can afford, and I hope it's within your consideration.
